mapper.select: select CAMPNO, CAMPNAME, CONTENT, PRICE, CATEGORY, MEMBERID from CAMP where CAMPNO = #{ campNo }
SELECT CAMPFILENO, SAVEDFILENAME, USERFILENAME, CAMPNO, FLAG FROM CAMPFILE WHERE CAMPNO = #{ campNo } AND FLAG = 1
SELECT CAMPFILENO, SAVEDFILENAME, USERFILENAME, CAMPNO, FLAG FROM CAMPFILE WHERE CAMPNO = #{ campNo } AND FLAG = 0
SELECT * FROM CAMP ORDER BY CAMPNO DESC LIMIT #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CAMP (CAMPNAME, CONTENT, PRICE, CATEGORY, MEMBERID) VALUES (#{campName}, #{content}, #{price}, #{category}, #{memberId})
INSERT INTO CAMPFILE (CAMPNO, SAVEDFILENAME, USERFILENAME, FLAG) VALUES (#{campNo}, #{savedFileName}, #{userFileName}, #{flag})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM CAMP WHERE CAMPNO = #{ campNo }
DELETE FROM CAMPFILE WHERE CAMPFILENO = #{ campFileNo }
mapper.select: SELECT CONTENT, TITLE, REGDATE, MEMBERID FROM REVIEW WHERE CAMPNO = #{ campNo } ORDER BY CAMPNO DESC
